name: Delayed Notifications for Contact Form 7
author: Ristretto Apps

sections.description:
Delayed Notifications for Contact Form 7 enhances your control over Contact Form 7 by allowing you to delay email notifications. Whether you need to manage email traffic better or stagger notifications to avoid server overload, this plugin gives you the flexibility to adjust notification timing to your needs.

Features:

  • Easy Setup: Integrates directly with Contact Form 7’s existing settings.
  • Customizable Delay: Specify the delay period for each form individually.
  • Reliable Delivery: Ensures that your delayed emails are sent out reliably.

Use Cases:

  • Customer Support Forms: Delay notifications during off-hours to manage support staff workload.
  • Event Registration: Stagger confirmation emails to avoid server spikes during high registration periods.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/delayed-notifications-for-cf7 directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the settings in Contact Form 7 to configure your delayed notifications.
sections.faq:
Can I set different delays for different forms?

Yes, the delay can be customized for each form individually through the Contact Form 7 interface.

Is there a maximum delay limit?

You can set a delayed email to go out within 7 days of submission.

short_description: Allows you to delay the Contact Form 7 email notifications by the period of time of your choosing.
